website_summaries.verdict: At about a third less than comparable dual-pillow throw sets, this stands out as a good value for the price.
pros: Users appreciate the quality, comfort, and style of these throw pillows and feel they are a good value for the money
We love that they hold their shape over time
cons: The colors may differ slightly from how they appear on the website
A few consumers say the size is smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pillows!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are adorable and gorgeous! They add the perfect touch to my outdoor set! So much so, I ordered another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Graf

customer_reviews.title: Descent Outdoor Lumbar Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Quality good for the price. Ordered the Azule & color goes well with outdoor rug I wanted to coordinate with. Gave 5 stars for durability & water resistance but time will tell with these 2 ratings. On a lanai so won't be subjected to direct sun or rain. Good quality outdoor material. Would recommend based on Quality, Style & Price I paid. Large selection of colors & prints. However some options are much higher priced than what I ordered & I feel $40 for 2 is too high for size of pillow. Support isn't super firm but good for lumbar in chairs I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie W

customer_reviews.title: size misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric and colors. However the size is not as represented in description. Stated size was 12 x 19 x 4. Pillows received are actually 10 x 16.5 x 4. Not happy. Trying to decide if I should keep them.
customer_reviews.author: gypsyT

customer_reviews.title: Lovely cushions for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Can't quite believe how inexpensive these accent cushions were. They look exactly as pictured - vibrant colours, the cushion has great shape, and they match our outdoor rug. Love, and would definitely buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie V

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to review several key features
customer_reviews.text: As I have yet to use this product for its intended purpose, decorative use, I can only speak to a few notable items. The pillows are very attractive and appear to be well made. I’ll be using them on my patio year round. As I live in the desert area of Southern California we are subject to very harsh summer conditions. I’ll try to make it a point to update my review a year from now. In the meantime I’m going to enjoy looking at the pillows.
customer_reviews.author: T. F. WhiteTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Spendy, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, look beautiful. Very sturdy, well made and comfortable. Definitely water resistant, but obviously don't leave them out in pouring storms and expect them to be perfectly dry in an hour. Main gripe is they do fade a bit. Still look nice, but this year we sprayed our new ones with Scotchguard. Seemed to help, we'll see how they look after another summer.
customer_reviews.author: Andy J-L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, just the pop we were looking for and made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returns aren't really free
customer_reviews.text: Pillows didn't fit my chairs. They were too small and slid out the back of the rockers. When I went to do a return, I found out it's only a free return if I take it to a UPS store. Instead of putting it with routine pickups at work, I'm supposed to drive to the next county to find a store?? It should have stated free returns with strings attached. Very misleading thus the one star.
customer_reviews.author: Kim R.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to accompany my outdoor patio set. They arrived first, and I fell so in love with them that I threw out my old couch accent pillows and kept these on my chocolate colored sectional couch. They are very beautiful, and comfortable. For the price don't hesitate. Very excellent purchase. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Faded!
customer_reviews.text: According to the selling features for the fabric on these pillows, it is fade-resistant. They are not. Very disappointed to see the fabric is fading significantly. They will not be usable next summer. I will not buy again from this source.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor pillows!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the blue pillows and they are exactly as pictured. We've only had them for a week so I can't speak to their durability, but they feel substantial. They added the perfect pop of color we were looking for on our patio. Also, I feel this is a great value! I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Pillows!
customer_reviews.text: These lumbar cushions are great. The Fabric is study and Gorgeous! The color is a dark red- Which I love But do not expect a true bright red color. Classy and expensive looking! I’ve ordered the seat cushions to match,
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to rate water resistance since they are on a glider on our covered porch. They are nicely made and, although I wish they were a bit larger, like them a great deal. (Think the larger, square pillows would have been better for what I wanted them for.). However, would highly recommend pillows made by the same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Happy62

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Colors and mainly waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great accent piece to my outdoor sofa. Not water proof completely, but weather resistant. HAs a wicking material. Water will run off in a light rain, but a full on downpour they will get wet. Use them as accent pieces but have also used them as a head rest and they are very comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Michalak

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: If you're expecting "soft" and cushy. Don't order these. They're more like a thick, stiffish canvas. But that's exactly what I wanted to decorate my outdoor patio with. Something to decorate and add color...not nap on. I feel like the fabric will hold up for a while, with this fabric. Nice and filled/plump enough to use as support, behind your back. If you want. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Misleading size description
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive these rectangular pillows in the mail, unfortunately was very dissappointed with how small they looked!!! In no way these are 19x12 inches in size. Very misleading size description. These are tiny! I am thinking maybe I should send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Anutayatuta

customer_reviews.title: Has kept it's look with morning sun and some rain for almost a year
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and cute. I do try to tuck out of the rain and it only gets morning sun; which is pretty extreme where I live. The color and shape are like new after a year!
customer_reviews.author: Kimbas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my balcony. I need the lumbar support when I’m sitting. They look beautiful and are perfect size for my chairs. They are very soft. I’ll probably have to add filling after a few months, but that’s ok. They serve their purpose and add a nice pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mo

customer_reviews.title: Cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillows! I was a little worried about the shape, but they fit very well with my bench.. they are comfy and when they get a little dirt/leaf on them, just shake it off... love it
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great pillows. Nice and vibrant. I use these on my front patio. Gives a nice pop of color next to my flowers. I don’t remember the price of these but I do remember thinking they should be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: ThompsonThomas

customer_reviews.title: Colors are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my new couch. The colors are true and vibrant. My husband loves them when he is "resting" his eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lope

customer_reviews.title: Have held up over the years
customer_reviews.text: These pillows have held up incredibly well! I think I purchased 2 or 3 years ago and never put them out of the direct sun. The only signs of wear is fading from the original color but they still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were more vibrant.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they are not as vibrant as the picture shows. I was looking for a bright vibrant cobalt blue and a crisp white. These pillows seem a bit faded. From a far distance away they look okay. I’m still going to keep them though. Shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Durable fabric. Hopefully will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute/rich colors
customer_reviews.text: It is nice looking but it’s not as sturdy but it’s ok. It looks very rich,vibrant as pictures described.
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: These have been sitting outside for a month a look adorable and are wearing very well. They are well made and appear to be quite durable. I’d buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: SC Garden Gnome

customer_reviews.title: Truly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Received a wicker set as a house warming gift bit the cushions sucked! So on to finding the best value for the money and could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzyluv

customer_reviews.title: Great accent pieces. Will complement any room decor...
customer_reviews.text: Complements my other accent hunter green rectangular pillows. Goes well with my chocolate brown sectional. Looks like pictured. Delivery was good, pricing good. Recommend. Good material.
customer_reviews.author: Catt

customer_reviews.title: How to easily and quickly exchange these pillows at a time when I'm not going inside public places.
customer_reviews.text: To my great disappointment, my lime green, rectangular outdoor pillows came today as square, navy pillows ☹
customer_reviews.author: JPAUBURN

customer_reviews.title: Love these. They’re so pretty and cheerful.
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are beautiful. They look amazing with my set. I’d submit a photo but everything is put away for winter. Next season I will though
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pattern and really brought together my chaise lounge cushions with my chair cushions.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseC

customer_reviews.title: Cute set to compliment cushions.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pattern. Needed cushions for a deep seat set of patio furniture. These pillows compliments the pattern nicely. Quality workmanship - solid/clean seams, holds up to so cal weather nicely, comfortable back support, pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and attractive pillows
customer_reviews.text: What does the well made pillow and the colors match our outdoor patio furniture perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Skip is Hip

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful accent pillows
customer_reviews.text: Received these pillows days earlier than projected which was a great surprise. They are well made and beautiful blend of color. Highly recommend not only for outdoor use but are beautiful on my two family room side chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Cute pillows
customer_reviews.text: These look great on my rocking chairs on my front porch!
customer_reviews.author: shandelu

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: They look nice and seem like good quality, but I wasn’t expecting them to be so small. That’s my fault for not checking the dimensions. I like them ok, have them on a porch swing
customer_reviews.author: Littlebug

customer_reviews.title: Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern on these pillows! Worked well and looked beautiful for their first season of use. Can't wait to show them back off in the spring with my red outdoor sectional.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few weeks now and they are great. Supportive, stylish, and a great price. I have these under a covered balcony so I can't speak to how water resistant they are, but I will likely store in the garage during our rainy, Pacific NW winters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than they claim
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than they claim, the description says 19" by 12", its really 16" by 9". So miss leading. To bad, because the quality and the bold print is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the pillows. Colors are vibrant and quality great.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is beautiful in person. Makes the pool lounge chairs look new again and really brightened up the pool area.
customer_reviews.author: P Hong

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillows
customer_reviews.text: While these pillows are not made by designer standards, they are sewn well, and are great to use outside or inside. The color is not bright blue, but a medium blue that can be used with royal blue, or navy. Whatever shade of blue I've placed it next to, it takes on that shade of blue and works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie Skies

customer_reviews.title: Nice and pretty pillows
customer_reviews.text: Great pillows for the money. Had in hot sun for a couple of months no fading at all.
customer_reviews.author: jed

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pillows and good value - I have owned a different color set of them from this brand before and they lasted three years with minimal fading on my front porch rockers that get direct daytime sun. In fact, they are still in good shape but because they had white in them look a little dingy so I updated with these green ones that don't have white in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo M

customer_reviews.title: Love these pillows!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the fabric is very durable. The color is true to what is shown. A very good product.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cushions
customer_reviews.text: Received as described. Love the pattern and design. Perfect fit for my chairs! Would purchase again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: D. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: Pillows are as pictured and described. Wish they were a bit larger. Fabric appears to be durable and colors are vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow-but
customer_reviews.text: It is the size stated in the description, still, seeing is believing. These are slightly on the small size, as I was looking for back support on my patio lounge chair, and support for under my knees. They are well made, and quite firm, but just a little to small for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Agent 99

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the size as they sit easily on your lower back for our outdoor chairs. Beautiful colors and design and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Feedback

customer_reviews.title: nice for my buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my pillows to those who don't im so sorry they look as picture above!!! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christian Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I tried to cancel but they had shipped. FAST. Now that I have them I want the rest of the cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Needham

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but fade quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another set, different size but same result. After one summer in the sun, these faded quickly to a light pale color. They don't look great but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: B Everett

customer_reviews.title: Fully stuffed pillow.
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are fine, but as some others have stated, they are very full. I was hoping to use one of them behind my back but they are too full for that, but otherwise they are very nice. The material pattern is not centered on the pillow, so if that is something you want, I would not recommend getting them, but I am happy with my purchase, and they have gotten quite a bit of use already.
customer_reviews.author: craftygrandma

customer_reviews.title: Nice cushions-great prices!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern on these cushions! We needed to update our lanai furniture, and we were so happy to find so many sizes available. The pattern is a little less flashy in person. I did notice a slight difference in the dye lots of the various cushions (background brown). Not anything that clashes, but if you are a perfectionist, just be forewarned. Very happy with the quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: ejmp

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for 2
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my chairs on my front porch. Use for behind my neck. Very comfy. Not sure about water resistance, haven't gotten wet.
customer_reviews.author: glacier7

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy pillow. Vibrant color! Perfect size for patio bench! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Looks better than in the photos. Highly recommended these pillows. They matches my patio sectional cushions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fluffy pillows that look nice on my outdoor chairs
customer_reviews.text: Very full, fluffy pillows that look nice on my outdoor chairs. The color coordinates perfectly with the patterned seat cushions I already had. They seem very durable and are heavy enough that they stay put when it's windy. (I also appreciated that they arrived in a reasonable-sized box and had no plastic or other packing materials around them. I dislike unnecessary packaging.)
customer_reviews.author: Greenbyoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and shape to accompany the chair cushions that they match. Well made and very sturdy/durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great decor and functionality!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased more for accent then for functionality. I have a bad back and they became more functional then accent ... Ironically. Love the color.... Just as I had pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lee

customer_reviews.title: outdoor pillows
customer_reviews.text: Great "bang for your buck". Good fabric on pillows for outdoor with a vibrant blue color. I am very pleased with the quality which surprised me for the great price versus department stores. Delivery as always with Amazon was super fast. I was a little nervous about buying outdoor pillows sight unseen since you never know about the quality but I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Joners

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows look super high end for the price. This past week or so since receiving these, we've had some pretty unusual weather and these have made it through the snow, rain and wind. Great product and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Ambi

customer_reviews.title: bonus pillows
customer_reviews.text: These look great on a patio! I was only expecting two, but it came with four which was a pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.author: Rachael rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pattern & Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are a great value with wonderful style. The pattern is very trendy, yet classic enough to look stylish for years. The indigo blue is the color of medium wash denim. I was hoping for a brighter blue, but this color did not disappoint. The pillows are stuffed to a good consistency and look like they will be durable as well. Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: blissfulfour

customer_reviews.title: More like 10x17. We have sat on them for several ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these during Prime Day. These are not 12x19. More like 10x17. We have sat on them for several days to see if they will expand. Nothing. We ordered 2 pillows for the back of a bench. If the dimensions were right, it would have been perfect. Now it looks a little lost given the empty space between pillows. The exterior of pillow feel like an outdoor pillow than an indoor ones. We are undecided about returning. Will probably not recommend purchase to others.
customer_reviews.author: Copacethics858

customer_reviews.title: Look great and seem durable
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are comfortable and look great. So far they are surviving the rain and wind outdoors, but it's only been about a month. On the other hand, it's been a month of hot weather and direct sun exposure, and the pillows look as new.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Trice

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pillows. I haven't used them yet, they are going to be used with our outdoor wicker furniture yet. The material seems durable, and overall well made. I love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: MJsto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my deck
customer_reviews.text: The colors were exactly as pictured and the size was perfect for my outdoor furniture. Delivered on time as promised
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillows. I have several sizes and prints. The colors are vibrant, and they hold up well in the elements. If it rains, they dry very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Savontb82Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Skip these!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking and not sewn straight. You can do better!
customer_reviews.author: Livin' The Dream in RSF

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable in the back of the chair at your lumbar
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these with the Greendale Outdoor Sunbeam yellow seat cushions and they match perfectly. They are comfortable in the back of the chair at your lumbar. Great looking and very useful when sitting for a while on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Rose

customer_reviews.title: These pillows are great
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are well made, a good size, colorful, just what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Smitley

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these pillows and loved them so much that I went ahead and ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these pillows and loved them so much that I went ahead and ordered another! They really brighten up my patio. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shade of green.
customer_reviews.text: Exact bolster shape I wanted & shade of green I needed. Would have ordered a coupke more but price jumped drastically after my initial purchase so opted not to.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnimom

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable pillows
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pillows that finish off our outdoor conversation space nicely. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patti V

customer_reviews.title: Look great, but overstuffed.
customer_reviews.text: These look great and were the best price I could find for this type pillow. They are stuffed more than I want. I removed about half the stuffing and now they are more like what I wanted. I am using them on a porch swing and the extra stuffing made them uncomfortable. With the stuffing removed, they are much better.
customer_reviews.author: DG22RMK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful outdoor pillows
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful outdoor pillows add a touch of color to the all white set
customer_reviews.author: bransmom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Using these for our outdoor patio. So far so good! They are super cute and the quality is worth the price. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: A bit small
customer_reviews.text: I must have missed the small dimensions. But they are well made even if a bit less rectangular and somewhat smaller than the published dimensions say. Probably a TV advertiser wrote up the description.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busse

customer_reviews.title: It does not feel good behind you
customer_reviews.text: I'm removing some of the stuffing, they are too puffy! other than that they are OK but not really a lumbar pillow. It does not feel good behind you, too puffy! The seam where they closed the pillow after stuffing is big and sewn poorly! I might return because of these issues!
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor pillow for lower back support. Goes nicely with another Greendale design.
customer_reviews.author: Bexter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillows. They look great against the floral pattern of the cushions on my deck furniture. The quality is terrific. Exactly what I was looking for and only find at twice the price for ONE pillow. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela B. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric
customer_reviews.text: These pillows seem to be well constructed and the fabric is a nice weight. Very vibrant colors. Adds a nice spark on my patio. My only complaint is that the stripes don't line up along the seams. They are off enough to be OFF. That, to me, makes such a huge difference in the look of Quality!! Other than that, they are seemingly decent pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy S. Mall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Easy to clean. Would buy again This was the only photo I have
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Well made but a lot smaller than expected. I have to pay attention when the dimensions are given
customer_reviews.author: julie s.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bright pillows! Price was fair, they are weather resistant.
customer_reviews.author: User_Lm

customer_reviews.title: Full and vibrant
customer_reviews.text: I use on covered porch. very well made and plump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color/nice product
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the color with the rest of my furniture so I sent them back but the quality was very good and I may order in a different color
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Sabeckis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cute pillows
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillows! Super cute and vibrant colors. They look great on our outdoor porch swing
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ashley

customer_reviews.title: They are for the outside
customer_reviews.text: We have a small patio set outside, these fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Color is bright and vibrant as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Exactly what I wanted. Very pretty and seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and nicely made. I am very happy with all of my Greendale pillows, nice quality/price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not true royal blue, tealish color
customer_reviews.text: The blue color was not a true royal blue, it had a faint teal-ish tint, which didn’t work with my other blue and white decor. Other than the color issue, seems durable and water resistant, but have only had for one week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cushions
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality fabric with the right firmness for Lower back support. The pattern may look busy, but it's perfect with single colored chair. I'm using them on gray cushioned outdoor furniture.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect colors for matching my two colors of blue. Great price. Just as pretty as the picture online. And arrived in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Bridges

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Love the Graphite color and the quality of the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: trekcyclist

customer_reviews.title: Powerful pop of color in a highly functional patio/porch pillow
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of these pillows are perfect on my porch rockers. They are a tad smaller than I was expecting, though to be fair, the dimensions were there; I just didn't pay close attention or visualize accurately. The price was right, as I have been shopping around for a while, especially since it is a set of two.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality pillows
customer_reviews.text: Well made, colorful, durable & coordinate so well with the lawn chair pillows
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Schueler

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These look more expensive than they are and the colors in the photo are accurate. I bought them to match the colors in my sunroom and they look very nice on an off-white sectional!
customer_reviews.author: E. R.Top Contributor: Makeup

product_meta.title: Greendale Home Fashions Rectangle Outdoor Accent Pillows, Indigo, Set of 2
product_meta.description: Color:IndigoOC5811S2-INDIGO Color: Indigo Features: -100pct Polyester.-Filling material users 100pct recycled, post-consumer plastic bottles.-Fade resistant UV coated material.-Stain and water resistant fabric.-Modern prints for contemporary styles.-Added comfort, strength and durability. Color/Finish: -Set of two accent pillows.-Stylish and contemporary accent.
feature_bullets: Set includes two 19 x 12 inch accent pillows
Poly fiber fill made from 100-percent recycled, post-consumer plastic bottle
Overstuffed construction for extra comfort and longevity
Shell made in China. Filled and finished in the USA
Cushion dimensions are +/- 2 inches. Please note product will arrive in a slightly compressed state; please allow a few days for product to expand to final size listed in description

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars961 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
